/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC   -shared -Wl,-soname,libencoder.so -o ../../../lib/libencoder.so CMakeFiles/encoder.dir/encoder.cpp.o  -L/usr/local/lib -lboost_system -lboost_thread -lboost_chrono -lboost_date_time -lboost_atomic -lpthread -lpigpiod_if2 -larmadillo -llapack -lblas -lblas -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
